TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit OrderablePartitioner`1<TSource> extends System.Collections.Concurrent.Partitioner`1<!TSource>
Public MustInherit Class OrderablePartitioner(Of TSource) Inherits Partitioner(Of TSource)
generic <typename TSource> public ref class OrderablePartitioner abstract : System::Collections::Concurrent::Partitioner<TSource>

span.span: Type of the elements in the collection.

summary.span: 表示将可排序数据源拆分为多个分区的特定方式。

span.span: Represents a particular manner of splitting an orderable data source into multiple partitions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生类的实现都负责将元素排成键 / 值对中的任何方式适合。The implementation of the derived class is responsible for ordering the elements into key-value pairs in whatever manner is appropriate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现一次返回一个元素的可排序分区程序：The following example shows how to implement an orderable partitioner that returns one element at a time: [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.orderablepartitioner/cs/orderablepartitioner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Concurrent.OrderablePartitioner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.concurrent.orderablepartitioner/vb/orderablepartitioner.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共成员是线程安全的可能从多个线程同时调用。

span.span: All public members of are thread-safe and may be called from multiple threads concurrently.

MemberSignature.Value: protected OrderablePartitioner (bool keysOrderedInEachPartition, bool keysOrderedAcrossPartitions, bool keysNormalized);
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool keysOrderedInEachPartition, bool keysOrderedAcrossPartitions, bool keysNormalized) cil managed
Protected Sub New (keysOrderedInEachPartition As Boolean, keysOrderedAcrossPartitions As Boolean, keysNormalized As Boolean)
protected: OrderablePartitioner(bool keysOrderedInEachPartition, bool keysOrderedAcrossPartitions, bool keysNormalized);

param.name: keysOrderedInEachPartition
param.span: 指示是否按键增加的顺序生成每个分区中的元素。

span.span: Indicates whether the elements in each partition are yielded in the order of increasing keys.

param.name: keysOrderedAcrossPartitions
param.span: 指示前一分区中的元素是否始终排在后一分区中的元素之前。

span.span: Indicates whether elements in an earlier partition always come before elements in a later partition.

param.span: 如果为 true，则分区 0 中的每个元素的顺序键比分区 1 中的任何元素都要小，分区 1 中的每个元素的顺序键比分区 2 中的任何元素都要小，依次类推。

span.span: If true, each element in partition 0 has a smaller order key than any element in partition 1, each element in partition 1 has a smaller order key than any element in partition 2, and so on.

param.name: keysNormalized

span.span: Indicates whether keys are normalized.

param.span: 如果为 true，所有顺序键均为范围 [0 .

span.span: If true, all order keys are distinct integers in the range [0 ..
numberOfElements-1].

param.span: 如果为 false，顺序键仍必须互不相同，但只考虑其相对顺序，而不考虑其绝对值。

span.span: If false, order keys must still be distinct, but only their relative order is considered, not their absolute values.

summary.span: 从派生类中的构造函数进行调用以便使用索引键上指定的约束初始化 类。

span.span: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the class with the specified constraints on the index keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!TSource> GetDynamicPartitions() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDynamicPartitions () As IEnumerable(Of TSource)

summary.span: 创建一个可将基础集合分区成可变数目的分区的对象。

span.span: Creates an object that can partition the underlying collection into a variable number of partitions.

returns.span: 一个可针对基础数据源创建分区的对象。

span.span: An object that can create partitions over the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的对象实现接口。The returned object implements the interface. 调用对象上创建序列的另一个分区。Calling on the object creates another partition over the sequence. 默认实现提供相同的行为只不过返回的分区集不提供的元素的键。The default implementation provides the same behavior as except that the returned set of partitions does not provide the keys for the elements. 则仅支持方法属性是否返回 true。The method is only supported if the property returns true. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

exception.span: 该基类不支持动态分区。

span.span: Dynamic partitioning is not supported by the base class.

exception.span: 它必须在派生类中实现。

span.span: It must be implemented in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<int64, !TSource>> GetOrderableDynamicPartitions() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetOrderableDynamicPartitions () As IEnumerable(Of KeyValuePair(Of Long, TSource))

abstract member GetOrderableDynamicPartitions : unit -> seq<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<int64, 'Source>> override this.GetOrderableDynamicPartitions : unit -> seq<System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair<int64, 'Source>>

summary.span: 创建一个可将基础集合分区成可变数目的分区的对象。

span.span: Creates an object that can partition the underlying collection into a variable number of partitions.

returns.span: 一个可针对基础数据源创建分区的对象。

span.span: An object that can create partitions over the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的对象实现接口。The returned object implements the interface. 调用对象上创建序列的另一个分区。Calling on the object creates another partition over the sequence. 每个分区通过键-值对表示为一个枚举器。Each partition is represented as an enumerator over key-value pairs. 对中的值是元素本身，并且该密钥是一个整数，它确定此元素与其他元素的相对顺序。The value in the pair is the element itself, and the key is an integer which determines the relative ordering of this element against other elements. 则仅支持方法属性是否返回 true。The method is only supported if the property returns true. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

exception.span: 此分区程序不支持动态分区。

span.span: Dynamic partitioning is not supported by this partitioner.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<valuetype System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2<int64, !TSource>>> GetOrderablePartitions(int32 partitionCount) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetOrderablePartitions (partitionCount As Integer) As IList(Of IEnumerator(Of KeyValuePair(Of Long, TSource)))

span.span: The number of partitions to create.

summary.span: 将基础集合分区成指定数目的可排序分区。

span.span: Partitions the underlying collection into the specified number of orderable partitions.

returns.span: 一个包含 枚举器的列表。

span.span: A list containing enumerators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个分区通过键-值对表示为一个枚举器。Each partition is represented as an enumerator over key-value pairs. 对的值是元素本身，并且该密钥是一个整数，它确定此元素与数据源中的其他元素的相对顺序。The value of the pair is the element itself, and the key is an integer which determines the relative ordering of this element against other elements in the data source. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1<!TSource>> GetPartitions(int32 partitionCount) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPartitions (partitionCount As Integer) As IList(Of IEnumerator(Of TSource))

span.span: The number of partitions to create.

summary.span: 将基础集合分区成给定数目的可排序分区。

span.span: Partitions the underlying collection into the given number of ordered partitions.

returns.span: 一个包含 枚举器的列表。

span.span: A list containing enumerators.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现提供相同的行为只不过返回的分区集不提供的元素的键。The default implementation provides the same behavior as except that the returned set of partitions does not provide the keys for the elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeysNormalized As Boolean
public: property bool KeysNormalized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取是否规范化顺序键。

span.span: Gets whether order keys are normalized.

value.span: 如果规范化键，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: true if the keys are normalized; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果返回 true，则所有顺序键都均在范围 [0..If returns true, all order keys are distinct integers in the range [0 .. numberOfElements-1] 中的不同整数。numberOfElements-1]. 如果该属性返回 false，顺序键仍必须是非重复，但仅考虑其相对顺序，不其绝对值。If the property returns false, order keys must still be distinct, but only their relative order is considered, not their absolute values. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeysOrderedAcrossPartitions As Boolean
public: property bool KeysOrderedAcrossPartitions { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取前一分区中的元素是否始终排在后一分区中的元素之前。

span.span: Gets whether elements in an earlier partition always come before elements in a later partition.

value.span: 如果前一分区中的元素始终排在后一分区中的元素之前，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: true if the elements in an earlier partition always come before elements in a later partition; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果返回 true，则分区 0 中的每个元素具有较小的顺序键比分区 1，分区 1 中的每个元素中的任何元素具有较小的顺序键比分区 2，依此类推中的任何元素。If returns true, each element in partition 0 has a smaller order key than any element in partition 1, each element in partition 1 has a smaller order key than any element in partition 2, and so on. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property KeysOrderedInEachPartition As Boolean
public: property bool KeysOrderedInEachPartition { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取是否按键增加的顺序生成每个分区中的元素。

span.span: Gets whether elements in each partition are yielded in the order of increasing keys.

value.span: 如果按键增加的顺序生成每个分区中的元素，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: true if the elements in each partition are yielded in the order of increasing keys; otherwise false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息，请参阅 [PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md).
